name: NBCNews
text: Fifty-seven years after Martin Luther King Jr.'s historic “I Have a Dream” speech at the Lincoln Memorial, a new generation of leaders in the racial justice movement spoke at the same spot on Friday to continue advocating for King’s vision. https://t.co/n9UY2rFpeO

name: NBCNews
text: Two men killed by gunman at Jacob Blake police shooting protest have been identified by authorities. https://t.co/ynlOcjRzPK

name: NBCNews
text:
Prominent Latino journalist Ruben Salazar, killed 50 years ago, tackled racism, identity. 

“In his writing, Salazar was speaking truth to power, and it was an act of defiance that was unusual for the times.” https://t.co/pzp7peTgHW
